sentences.en: A miracle is something that seems impossible but happens anyway.
sentences.cn: 奇迹就是看似不可能，却发生了。

sentences.en: A skeleton staff of 20 is being kept on.
Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
sentences.cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

sentences.en: Failure is never quite so frightening as regret do.
sentences.cn: 比失败更令人恐惧的是懊悔。

sentences.en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentences.cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentences.en: Generosity is its own form of power.
Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
sentences.cn: 好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。

sentences.en: I agree that she is the ablest of us.
sentences.cn: 我承认她是我们之中最能干的一个。

sentences.en: If you wait, all that happens is that you get older.
sentences.cn: 如果你等待，发生的只有变老。

sentences.en: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.--Winston Churchill
sentences.cn: 成功不是终点，失败也并非末日，最重要的是继续前进的勇气。

sentences.en: Success is not guaranteed. It is not handed to you. Success is earned.
sentences.cn: 成功无法保证，并非唾手可得。成功必须靠自己去争取。

sentences.en: The action is an open violation of the Vienna Convention.
sentences.cn: 该行为公然违背了《维也纳公约》。

sentences.en: The best thing to do when entering unknown territory is smile.
sentences.cn: 踏入未知地带最好的对策就是微笑。

sentences.en: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
sentences.cn: 你是什么样的人和你想成为什么样的之间的差距就是，你做了什么。

sentences.en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
sentences.cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

sentences.en: What is to become of me if you go away?
sentences.cn: 如果你走的话，我的结果将是怎样呢?

sentences.en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentences.cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

phrases.tran_cn: [口]照原来的样子；本来就是这样；不予改变
实际上；事实上；既然如此
时间就是金钱；一寸光阴一寸金
n. 爱是什么（美国喜剧）
哪个是；从句的表达形式之一

trans.tran_en: the third person singular of the present tense of be
